message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper is about building recruitment chatbots using ML/NLP techniques, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and artificial intelligence (AI). The paper also discusses the validation of a metric for estimating multi-class classifier performance, which is related to machine learning (ML) and evaluation of models. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
